tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_medical_records (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    lab_results TEXT,
    treatment_history TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL, address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE medical_records (record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id), lab_results TEXT, treatment_history TEXT, consultation_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE lab_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  test_name VARCHAR(50),
  test_date DATE,
  result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address TEXT,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE lab_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    medical_test VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    result TEXT,
    test_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE consultations (
    consultation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    consultation_date DATE,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(255),
    consultation_notes TEXT
);
